desc: This choir of 95 mixed voices performs a wide range of choral repertoire that often includes music for choir and instruments or organ as well as congregation. Participation is by audition and does not include first-year students. The ensemble conductor provides full details of all rehearsal and performance obligations. P/N only. May be repeated. Students in the St. Olaf Cantorei are encouraged to register for voice lessons.
name: St. Olaf Cantorei
